metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19919 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Versions of handlebars prior to 4.3.0 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollutionleading to Remote Code Execution. Templates may alter an Object's __proto__and __defineGetter__ properties, which may allow an attacker to executearbitrary code through crafted payloads.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

handlebars - 3:4.5.3-1
libjs-handlebars - 3:4.5.3-1
libjs-handlebars.runtime - 3:4.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-handlebars package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:4.5.3-1').
